coreServices.heading: Core services
coreServices.subheading: Below is a quick overview of services that we provide.

services.title: Machine learning engineering
services.description: End-to-end ML pipelines from data ingestion to model deployment. Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, and cloud-native ML platforms.

services.title: Computer vision
services.description: Image recognition, object detection, and visual understanding. Deep learning architectures, real-time processing, and edge deployment.

services.title: Natural language processing
services.description: Text understanding, sentiment analysis, and language generation. Transformer models, LLM integration, and conversational AI.

services.title: Data engineering & pipelines
services.description: Robust data infrastructure for ML at scale. Data warehousing, ETL automation, and real-time streaming architectures.

services.title: MLOps & model management
services.description: Operationalize ML with CI/CD, monitoring, and governance. Model versioning, drift detection, and automated retraining.

services.title: AI strategy & consulting
services.description: AI readiness assessments, use case prioritization, and responsible AI frameworks to ensure successful implementation.

process.heading: Our process
process.subheading: A rigorous, iterative approach that validates assumptions and minimizes risk.

steps.title: Problem definition
steps.description: Define success metrics, data requirements, and feasibility analysis.

steps.title: Data exploration & preparation
steps.description: Data audit, cleaning, labeling, and feature engineering for model training.

steps.title: Model development & training
steps.description: Experimentation, hyperparameter tuning, and baseline model evaluation.

steps.title: Validation & testing
steps.description: Performance testing, bias detection, and fairness evaluation across cohorts.

steps.title: Deployment & monitoring
steps.description: Production deployment, drift monitoring, and continuous performance tracking.

technologyStack.heading: Technology we typically use
technologyStack.subheading: Industry-standard ML frameworks and platforms optimized for production scale.

categories.title: ML Frameworks & Libraries
categories.description: TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM, and Hugging Face transformers.

categories.title: Data & Infrastructure
categories.description: Spark, Airflow, Kubernetes, DVC, and cloud platforms (AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI).

categories.title: Monitoring & Governance
categories.description: MLflow, Weights & Biases, Evidently, and custom dashboards for model performance.

technologyStack.note: We stay current with the latest advances in AI and ML while maintaining production stability and responsible deployment practices.
